title: Account hacked
body: I already submitted a help request but I'm just making this post for perhaps more exposure to a riot employee. Thanks.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and see that your ticket has been escalated to our account recovery team.  Make sure not to bump your ticket, otherwise it can drop you back to the bottom.  As an extra resource, you can also use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) for some steps in restoring access to the account.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
